Detailed Description

Exception class Bad Card Type (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CARDTYPE_BAD).

Throw when the card type doesn't correspond to what is asked. Used in :

  • PTEID_ReaderContext::getEIDCard()
  • PTEID_ReaderContext::getKidsCard()
  • PTEID_ReaderContext::getForeignerCard()
  • PTEID_ReaderContext::getSISCard()
